passiveDescription.0: The following effect will trigger every 10s: the equipping character will gain <cryo>0.052%</cryo> Energy Recharge for each point of Elemental Mastery they possess for 12s, with nearby party members gaining 30% of this buff. Multiple instances of this weapon can allow this buff to stack. This effect will still trigger even if the character is not on the field.
